emberwind.Maneuvers.Analyze.Desc: Make a Skill Check. If you succeed, +3 P to your next Action. 1 Stack.
emberwind.Maneuvers.Analyze.Name: Analyze
emberwind.Maneuvers.Betray.Desc: Make a Skill Check. If you succeed, Target Foe is OFF-GUARD until your next Turn.
emberwind.Maneuvers.Betray.Name: Betray
emberwind.Maneuvers.Daunt.Desc: When you use a Move Action, you may make a Skill Check. If you succeed, you may pass through Squares Occupied by Foes during that Action.
emberwind.Maneuvers.Daunt.Name: Daunt
emberwind.Maneuvers.Fade.Desc: Make a Skill Check. If you succeed, Foes cannot Target you until your next Turn.
emberwind.Maneuvers.Fade.Name: Fade
emberwind.Maneuvers.Feint.Desc: Make a Skill Check. If you succeed, +2 A to your next Action. 1 Stack.
emberwind.Maneuvers.Feint.Name: Feint
emberwind.Maneuvers.Focus.Desc: Make a Skill Check. If you succeed, +1 Healing or Damage Die to your next Action. 1 Stack.
emberwind.Maneuvers.Focus.Name: Focus
emberwind.Maneuvers.Guide.Desc: Make a Skill Check. If you succeed, 1 Other Hero gains Advantage on his or her next Roll. 1 Stack.
emberwind.Maneuvers.Guide.Name: Guide
emberwind.Maneuvers.Optimize.Desc: Make a Skill Check. If you succeed, you may convert A into P at a ratio of 2:1 or vice versa. Optimize and its Effect is removed if you become FALLEN or at the end of the Encounter.
emberwind.Maneuvers.Optimize.Name: Optimize
emberwind.Maneuvers.Refresh.Desc: Make a Skill Check. If you succeed, heal [Tier]+4 HP.
emberwind.Maneuvers.Refresh.Name: Refresh
emberwind.Maneuvers.Spring.Desc: When you use a Shift Action while adjacent to a Foe, make a Skill Check. If you succeed, +2 Squares to that Action.
emberwind.Maneuvers.Spring.Name: Spring
emberwind.Maneuvers.Study.Desc: Make a Skill Check. If you succeed, you may look at 1 Foe's Hex Grid, Default Characteristics, or Special Abilities Table.
emberwind.Maneuvers.Study.Name: Study
emberwind.Maneuvers.StudyVariant.Desc: Make a Skill Check. If you succeed, you may look at 1 Foe's Foe Card.
emberwind.Maneuvers.StudyVariant.Name: Study (Variant)
emberwind.Maneuvers.Tumble.Desc: Move 1-3 Squares. Can move through any Combatant.
emberwind.Maneuvers.Tumble.Name: Tumble
emberwind.Maneuvers.Vault.Desc: Make a Skill Check. If you succeed, your next Move Action can be used to traverse terrain vertically. Your Move Action must end on a Square you can Occupy.
emberwind.Maneuvers.Vault.Name: Vault
emberwind.Maneuvers.Weather.Desc: When you enter a Square with a Local Field Effect, you may make a Skill Check. If you succeed, ignore the Local Field Effect.
emberwind.Maneuvers.Weather.Name: Weather
